title: Whispers Of Deceit
description: Final Major Project for my degree, it's a multiplayer game where players explore a haunted mansion, solve puzzles, and figure out who the traitor is.

modal.detailedDescription: This was my first time doing networked multiplayer in Unreal Engine, and it was a great learning experience. The game features a unique 'Haunt' feature where the gameplay would change depending on certain factors and this system would setup the second stage of the game based on a randomly selected 'Haunt'.
